ticket.title: establish_connection on through connection does not work
ticket.original-body:
The has_many :through breaks when the models aren't all in the same db using establish_connection. I saw there were some updates in rails 2.3.4 so I updated to that and still the problem persists. For now I used a workaround similar to http://www.setfiremedia.com/blog/rails-has-many-through-association-across-databases
Is there anyone already building this?
